SELECT m3.name AS name, m3.link_url AS linkUrl, r.name AS roleName, m3.description AS description FROM role r JOIN role_menu rm ON r.id=rm.role_id JOIN menu m3 ON rm.menu_id=m3.id JOIN menu m2 ON m3.parent_menu_id=m2.id WHERE m3.level=3 AND m3.id = #{id} AND m3.parent_menu_id = #{parentMenuId}

SELECT m1.id AS id, m1.`name` AS name, m1.link_url AS linkUrl, m1.description AS description, m2.`name` AS parentMenuName, r.`name` AS roleName FROM role r JOIN role_menu rm ON r.id = rm.role_id JOIN menu m1 ON rm.menu_id = m1.id JOIN menu m2 ON m1.parent_menu_id = m2.id WHERE m1.`level` = 3 AND m1.id = #{id} AND r1.id = #{roleId}

SELECT m1.id AS id, m1.`name` AS name, m1.link_url AS linkUrl, m1.description AS description, m2.`name` AS parentMenuName, r.`name` AS roleName FROM role r JOIN role_menu rm ON r.id = rm.role_id JOIN menu m1 ON rm.menu_id = m1.id JOIN menu m2 ON m1.parent_menu_id = m2.id WHERE m1.`level` = 1 AND m1.id = #{id} AND r1.id = #{roleId}
SELECT COUNT(m3.id) FROM menu m3 INNER JOIN menu m2 ON m3.parent_menu_id=m2.id WHERE m3.parent_menu_id=#{parentMenuId}
SELECT role.id FROM role WHERE role.name=#{roleName}
SELECT COUNT(menu.id) FROM menu WHERE id=#{id}
